original_text: And all Israel from Dan to Beersheba knew that Samuel was established as a prophet of the Lord.
korean_text: 단에서부터 브엘세바까지의 온 이스라엘이 사무엘은 여호와의 선지자로 세우심을 입은 줄을 알았더라

sentences.original_text: And all Israel from Dan to Beersheba knew
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 단에서 브엘세바까지 온 이스라엘은 알았으니

sentences.original_text: that Samuel was established as a prophet of the Lord.
